snippet: Italy’s Parliament gave final approval on Monday to a new electoral law championed by Prime Minister Matteo Renzi, despite furious objections from the opposition and some members of the governing Democratic Party.
lead_paragraph: Italy’s Parliament gave final approval on Monday to a new electoral law championed by Prime Minister Matteo Renzi, despite furious objections from the opposition and some members of the governing Democratic Party.

headline.main: Italy: Parliament Approves Overhaul Aimed at Improving Political Stability
